message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $130. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $120 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $125?  I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement.
I'm glad we're close, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your persistence.  $115 is still a bit low for me, but I'm willing to go down to $120 to make this deal work.  Let me know if you're interested.
I'm not sure I can go any lower than $110. I really want this product, but I'm trying to stick to my budget. Can you meet me at $110?
